body.p: Welcome to the management webapp contributor section of the Simal website. In this section you will find useful materials that are intended to help an interested party, like you, become involved with the improvement of the management webapp of the Simal project. Simal is open source software (using the Apache Software License V2). We are always looking for people to contribute, we need people with all sorts of skills including user testing, documentation writing, programming and marketing.
In this section you will find various types of information. Such as:

ul.li: How To documents describing specific development tasks
Implementation Notes are technical documents that describe how Simal is built. They are intended to allow new developers to find out where they need to work to achieve their aims.
Use Case descriptions covering use cases the Simal project hopes to address (complete with an indication of how much of the use case remains to be implemented)
